name: Darklands:Awakening
description:
Game plot:
You will control the protagonist to come to a mysterious prison and uncover the scary secrets unknown here! Players need to find clues to escape from here!
Content and gameplay
－Player operator fights with zombies
-Rich decryption elements
-Complete props and weapon system
-Explore the vast map
Game features:
－Real and exciting game mode in the first person.
－Tense and terrifying game atmosphere.
-Solve the mysteries in the prison and escape.
